page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ALISON
page.content: I AM 13 YEARS OF AGE AND I ATTEND CHURNET VIEW MIDDLE SCHOOL, LEEK. MY DAY BEGINS WITH THE FAMILY GETTING UP. MY FATHER GETS UP FIRST AND HE GOES OUT TO WORK AT SIX-THIRTY, MY MOTHER, SISTER AND I GET UP AROUND SEVEN-THIRTY. WE HAVE BREAKFAST AND I LEAVE FOR SCHOOL AT EIGHT-FIFTEEN. I USUALLY WALK TO SCHOOL ALTHOUGH IT IS QUITE A GOOD WAY AWAY. AT SCHOOL WE HAVE FOUR LESSONS A DAY, ON WEDNESDAY I HAVE FRENCH, GEOGRAPHY OR COMPUTER APPRECIATION, HISTORY AND GAMES. WE HAVE LUNCH FROM TWELVE O'CLOCK UNTIL ONE-FIFTEEN. SCHOOL FINISHES AT THREE-FORTYFIVE AND I ARRIVE HOME AT QUARTER PAST FOUR. IF I HAVE ANY HOMEWORK I DO IT AS SOON AS I GET HOME. OUR FAMILY HAS TEA AT AROUND SIX-THIRTY WHEN EVERYONE IS AT HOME. I WATCH SOME TELEVISION AND THEN GO TO BED AT TEN.
